item.description:
Who wants to go? I've never been to this women's expo, but I've been to others, and they are a lot of fun. There's lots of free samples, including wine and food, and demos. The cost is $10 but you can download a $2 off coupon from their Web site. http://www.southernne.... Free parking. I plan to arrive at 10:15.

Directions:
* I-95 North or South towards Warwick, RI
* Exit 12 onto Route 113 East
* Right onto Route 5 South
* Right into Crowne Plaza drive

Per Web site:
This event is dedicated to the celebration of women. One special day where women can be pampered, shop, sample great food, watch fashion shows, seminars, relax, destress, laugh, be entertained and learn about things relating to their lives and well being.

Exhibitors will be showcasing products and services created especially for women ...

* Fashion, Apparel and Jewelry

* Fitness and Exercise

* Careers

* Hand Crafted Arts

* Auto Dealers

* Organizing and Feng Shui

* Cosmetic Surgery and Skin Care

* Wireless Companies

* Marriage, Relationships and Dating

* Spas and Salons

* Gift Assortments and Personal Items

* Nutrition and Dieting

* Beauty and Cosmetics

* Financial Planning and Investments

* Home Decor and Decorating

* Hospital and Medical Services

* Banking and Financial Institutions

* Family and Parenting

* Workforce Advancement

* Travel and Vacation Planners

* Cuisine and Entertainment

* Women's Networking Groups

* Health and Wellness

* Education and Much More!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me in the lobby wearing a bright pink hat
item.name: Southern New England Women's Expo (FREE Wine Tasting and more...)
